SEARCH

Package com.kneelawk.codextra.api.attach.stream

@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault package com.kneelawk.codextra.api.attach.stream
Codextra attachment stream codecs.

This package contains StreamCodec utility codecs for managing attachments.

Usually it is easier to call methods on AttachmentKey rather than using these codecs directly.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.kneelawk.codextra.api.attach
    Codextra Attachments API.
    com.kneelawk.codextra.api.attach.codec
    Codextra attachment DFU codecs.
  • Class
    Description
    AttachingStreamCodec<B extends net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf,V>
    A StreamCodec for attaching a value and passing it as context to the wrapped codec.
    AttachmentDispatchStreamCodec<A,B extends io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf,V>
    A StreamCodec that retrieves an attachment and determines which codec to use based on that attachment.
    ChildBufferFactory<B1,B2>
    Creates a buffer that inherits metadata (like RegistryAccess) from a parent buffer.
    IfPresentDispatchStreamCodec<A,B extends io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf,V>
    A StreamCodec that retrieves an attachment if present and uses it to determine which codec to use or uses another codec if the attachment is absent.
    IfPresentStreamCodec<B extends io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf,V>
    A StreamCodec that delegates to one codec if an attachment is present and another if the attachment is absent.
    MutReadAttachingStreamCodec<B1 extends net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf,B2 extends net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf,K,V>
    A StreamCodec that decodes one value and uses it create attachments to attach to the context when decoding the result value, but that also allows mutation of the attachment while encoding, making sure those changes show up in the decoded key.
    ReadAttachingStreamCodec<B extends net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf,K,V>
    A StreamCodec that decodes one value and uses it to create attachments to attach to the context when decoding the result value.
    RetrievalStreamCodec<A,B extends io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf,V>
    A StreamCodec that retrieves an attachment from the decoding context.
    RetrieveWithStreamCodec<A,B extends io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf,O,R>
    A StreamCodec that decodes a value and combines it with an attachment to create a result.
